inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getVpcPeeringConnection.

cidrBlock.description: Primary CIDR block of the requester VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

filters.description: Custom filter block as described below.

id.description: ID of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

ownerId.description: AWS account ID of the owner of the requester VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

peerCidrBlock.description: Primary CIDR block of the accepter VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

peerOwnerId.description: AWS account ID of the owner of the accepter VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

peerRegion.description: Region of the accepter VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

peerVpcId.description: ID of the accepter VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

region.description: Region of the requester VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

status.description: Status of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

tags.description:
Map of tags, each pair of which must exactly match
a pair on the desired VPC Peering Connection.

More complex filters can be expressed using one or more `filter` sub-blocks,
which take the following arguments:

vpcId.description: ID of the requester VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getVpcPeeringConnection.

accepter.description:
Configuration block that describes [VPC Peering Connection]
(https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/peering/what-is-vpc-peering.html) options set for the accepter VPC.

cidrBlock.description: CIDR block associated to the VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection.

cidrBlockSets.description: List of objects with CIDR blocks of the requester VPC.

peerCidrBlockSets.description: List of objects with CIDR blocks of the accepter VPC.

requester.description:
Configuration block that describes [VPC Peering Connection]
(https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/peering/what-is-vpc-peering.html) options set for the requester VPC.
